Title: Relates to the liability of landowners who permit recreational uses of their land
Summary: Relates to the liability of landowners who permit recreational uses of their land; establishes landowners owe no duty to keep premises safe for entry, passage over premises or other recreational uses or to give warning of any hazardous condition or use of or structure or activity on such premises to persons entering for such purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง9-103, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the liability of landowners who permit recreational uses
